feed.title: BIP idea: Standardised p2sh bitcoin addresses requiring an arbitrary and/or combination of keys

entry.title: BIP idea: Standardised p2sh bitcoin addresses requiring an arbitrary and/or combination of keys
entry.summary: Erland Lewin proposed a method to create "Boolean addresses" which can be redeemed by a set of keys and multi-signatures combined with logical and/or operations. Reality Keys, a platform that verifies information against real-world events, confirms the proposal's aim to fix a painful point and sees it as a helpful solution if wallet authors adopt it. Edmund Edgar, founder of Social Minds Inc (KK), supports the proposal's sensible implementation.
